          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation de pétrole brut à partir d' animaux morts et de plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Formation of crude oil from dead animals and plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung des Rohöls von den toten Tieren und von
den Betrieben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do óleo cru dos animais inoperantes e 
das plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di petrolio greggio dagli animali 
guasti e dalle piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του ακατέργαστου πετρελαίου από τα νεκρά 
ζώα και τα φυτά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del petróleo crudo de animales 
muertos y de plantas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre la formation de pétrole brut à partir de plantes et d'animaux morts il y a des millions d'années.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the formation crude oil from plants and animals that had died millions of years ago.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Les animaux</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pétrole brut</string>
            <string language="en">crude oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">matériaux organiques</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mer</string>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couches de sédiment</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">les roches sédimentaires</string>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt das Anordnung Rohöl von den
Betrieben und von den Tieren, die Millionen Jahre vor gestorben 
hatten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra o óleo cru da formação 
das plantas e dos animais que tinham morrido milhões dos anos há.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra il petrolio greggio di 
formazione dalle piante e dagli animali che avevano morto milioni di 
anni fa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει το ακατέργαστο 
πετρέλαιο σχηματισμού από τα φυτά και τα ζώα που είχαν πεθάνει 
εκατομμύρια των ετών πριν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra el petróleo crudo de la 
formación de las plantas y de los animales que habían muerto 
millones hace de años.</string>
          </description>
